definitions.definition: Sexually attracted to members of the opposite sex .
labels: of a person or other animal
definitions.label_groups: of a person or other animal

definitions.definition: Between two people of different sex .
labels: of a romantic or sexual act or relationship
definitions.label_groups: of a romantic or sexual act or relationship

definitions.definition: Having a sexual desire for the opposite sex seen as unhealthy , including a proclivity for nonreproductive sex.

main_definition: ( of a person or other animal ) Sexually attracted to members of the opposite sex .
secondary_definitions: ( of a romantic or sexual act or relationship ) Between two people of different sex .
( obsolete , medicine ) Having a sexual desire for the opposite sex seen as unhealthy , including a proclivity for nonreproductive sex.
